metadata.dc:author: Iranzo, P
Martín, E
del Olmo, J A
Mascaró, J M
metadata.dc:description: Two familial observations of Birt-Hogg-Dubé syndrome are reported. In fact they were cases of tuberous sclerosis. The authors comment that probably this syndrome is an expression form of tuberous sclerosis.
metadata.dc:title: El síndrome de Birt-Hogg-Dubé como forma de expresión de la esclerosis tuberosa. A propósito de dos observaciones personales en dos hermanas.
[Birt-Hogg-Dubé syndrome as an expression of tuberous sclerosis. Apropos of 2 personal cases in 2 sisters].
